author: Michelle Yan
title: Drone captures mesmerizing footage of water overflowing in a portal-like 'Glory Hole'
text:
Social Good Summit Drone captures mesmerizing footage of water overflowing in a portal-like 'Glory Hole' 
There's water overflowing in the 'Glory Hole' spillway at Lake Berryessa, California. Fortunately, a drone captured the stunning visuals.
